name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4 (Released) Taipei. A notice from the Tokyo Hyatt Management Committee was circulated online, which mentioned: Recently, some residents in this building played the Chinese national anthem and other songs in the early morning. Please show public morality and turn down the volume to avoid affecting other residents' normal rest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"Salute to the greatest team in the world"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, Christians from the Heilongjiang Christian Council and the Harbin Christian Council gathered together to sing for the motherland.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 3, it was revealed online that several middle-aged women in Chongqing were dancing in the lounge of Jiangbei International Airport with loud music playing, disturbing other passengers' rest. On the evening of the 3rd, the airport responded that staff members tried to dissuade them, but they were unable to stop them immediately because they had no law enforcement power.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 4, in Huanghua City, Cangzhou, Hebei Province, a man threw money on the fourth floor of the local Jinbao City Mall, attracting onlookers. Hundred-yuan bills were flying everywhere. The mall staff said that the man had been taken away by the police. It was rumored online that the man was a 17-year-old boy who only had his sister as a relative. The money was "compensation from his parents who passed away." The boy was in depression because of his parents' death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another perspective:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the talk show actor "Shou Zi" posted content on his account, mocking the national table tennis player Wang Chuqin. He said that Wang Chuqin's loss was not called "upset" but "used to upset" and "if you are not good, practice more, if you are not in good shape, adjust." On October 4, Guangzhou Wild Comedy Talk Show issued a statement in response, saying that it had suspended its performance cooperation with "Shou Zi".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens said: Is it not okay to tell the truth?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that Lin Shengkui, director of the Fujian Provincial Medical Security Bureau, fell to his death, and the specific cause is unknown. Hong Kong media "Sing Tao Daily" reported that the news of Lin Shengkui's fall to his death was true. The video showed that the ground of a residential building was covered with blue cloth, and the police were guarding on the side.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 30, Huawei announced that Meng Wanzhou would serve as rotating chairman. The rotating chairman is the company's top leader during her term of office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Nomura Securities warned on October 4 that while investors may still be able to indulge in the prosperity of the stock market, a more sober assessment is needed. The biggest rebound in China's stock market in 16 years may turn into a collapse because the foundation of the Chinese economy is much weaker than before the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4 (Released) Tianjin. A netizen received a notice from the Audit Bureau stating that he needed to pay 66 yuan in personal income tax for a bonus he received from a company twelve years ago.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4, Jiangsu. Blogger "Xiao Hu's Life" interviewed a female worker. The worker said she was from Northeast China and worked on a construction site, earning 120 yuan a day. She said "hard work cannot make you rich, and farmers cannot change their fate"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4, Jiangsu. Blogger "Xiao Hu's Life" interviewed a female worker. The worker said she worked on a construction site and earned 120 yuan a day. She said "hard work cannot make you rich, and farmers cannot change their fate"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4 (Released) Chengdu, Sichuan. A man filmed a policeman driving without a seat belt, and the surrounding policemen turned a blind eye. So the man shouted angrily, "Does no one care? Are you guys protecting your own people? Why do you ignore the police for not wearing seat belts, and punish ordinary people? Why is this? Can anyone tell me an answer?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 1, Henan Provincial Party Secretary Lou Yangsheng held talks with Gree Group Chairman Dong Mingzhu on investment promotion.
Henan Village Bank depositors immediately sent text messages to Dong Mingzhu to warn of risks, strongly suggesting that Dong Mingzhu and Gree Group must be cautious in investing in Henan and be careful not to lose all their money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 3, Yu Jianrong, director of the Center for Social Research at the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, wrote that Red Guard leader Song Binbin should bear historical responsibility. Not only should the leaders be held accountable, but those who acted as thugs should also not be let off, and they should be made to bear the pillar of shame in history.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another employee was asked to return more than a thousand yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, corn farmers in many places reported that corn prices have plummeted this year. A farmer from Hebei said that corn cobs are 40 cents per pound, and several pounds of corn cobs cannot buy a bottle of mineral water, and corn cobs from an acre of land are not enough to pay for cooperative medical care. "People have worked hard and put in a lot of effort, but in the end they only get 30 or 40 cents per pound, and they have worked so hard for nothing."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported on October 4 that two Chinese men in the United States, together with others, submitted counterfeit iPhones to Apple for repair, inducing Apple to replace the counterfeit phones with genuine iPhones. The two men submitted more than 6,000 fake phones to Apple in total, causing more than $2.5 million in losses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4 (Released) CCTV interviewed citizens during the National Day holiday. One elderly person said during the interview that there are so many preferential policies for the elderly that we can’t enjoy them all. Another elderly person interjected, “(We) are extremely happy!”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens responded: "Jingye" "You can tell he's from a bannerman with this accent"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 5, a netizen asked the Hangzhou police: If the Chinese man who poured coffee on a baby in Australia escapes back to Hangzhou, will the Hangzhou police arrest him?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 5, Taiwan. At the 113th National Day Gala of the Republic of China, President Lai Ching-te of the Republic of China said: Recently, the People's Republic of China just celebrated its 75th birthday, and in a few days, the Republic of China will celebrate its 113th birthday. Therefore, in terms of age, the People's Republic of China is absolutely impossible to become the motherland of the people of the Republic of China. On the contrary, the Republic of China may be the motherland of the people of the People's Republic of China who are over 75 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 5, a report said that in June this year, 33-year-old Chinese man Zhang Weixiong and his girlfriend traveled to Japan. Two days later, he asked for help in broken Japanese from a 20-year-old Japanese woman passing by in Asakusa, Tokyo, saying that there was a bug on his back. The woman kindly helped Mr. Zhang find the bug, but Mr. Zhang actually touched the woman's chest and flew back to China the next day. Four months later, the police found that Mr. Zhang flew to Fukuoka again, so he was taken to the police station at the airport. Mr. Zhang said, "I don't remember anything."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 4, a Douyin blogger posted a video explaining that fascism opposes democracy, freedom, human rights, and the concept of worshipping leaders. As a result, many netizens left comments in the comment section saying, "What a familiar taste! It turns out that fascism is right next to me."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Jiangsu, blogger "Walking into the Silver Circle" interviewed an old man on the roadside: Why do you think there are always a group of people with poor quality in society? The old man replied, "There is a gap in education in our country. People who are now retiring in their sixties to seventies have not graduated from elementary school. They are all illiterate and hooligans."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During the National Day holiday, netizens from all over the country posted videos saying that their boss used the excuse of a two-day National Day holiday, but when they returned to work after the holiday, they found that their boss had fled and even the factory's equipment had been moved out.
